page.title: 15GARAGE AT MONKSWOOD
page.content: This garage is a modern busy filling station on the main road from Usk to Pontypool.It serves the population of a largely agricultural area and also passing trade from mainly people travelling to and from nearby factories. The garage has a forecourt offering a sales area for about 20 cars and 4 petrol pumps with all grades of petrol and diesel fuel. Paraffin is also available.The workshop is equipped for servicing and repairing all varieties of vehicles private and agricultural.Spare parts, motor oils,farm produce and confectionery are sold. Behind the garage is a modern detatched house with a garden and small orchard so that the owner can live on the garage premises.
